title: Poster, ca. 1980
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink at LL: "Poster from a silkscreen print by MalaquiasMontoya, from / the touring group show "In Celebration of the State of / Palestine;" contact Wendy Masri (212) 795-0537" Imprinted in black ink at LC: "Published by Inkworks Press on its 15th Anniversary (1974-/1989) - quality offset printing for progressive and community / groups. 2827 7th St., Berkeley, CA 94710, (415) 845-7111" Imprinted in black ink at LR: "Produced in collaboration with the Palestine Solidarity / Committee (415) 861-1552 and the Middle East Children's / Alliance (415) 548-0542"
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ca. 1980.
ca. 1980. Support: Paper. Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs. 1993-53-104.
